# PKPassLibraryDidChange

**Type Property**

A notification that PassKit posts when the pass library changes.

## Declaration

```swift
static let PKPassLibraryDidChange: PKPassLibraryNotificationName
```

## Discussion

PassKit posts this notification on an arbitary queue, and only does so if an instance of `PKPassLibrary` exists. The notification’s user info dictionary describes the changes. See [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPassLibrary] for the keys it uses.

## Notification names

- **PKPassLibraryRemotePaymentPassesDidChange**: A notification that PassKit posts when it adds or removes a pass on a paired remote device.
